name: The Power of Melody
description:
The Power of Melody

Love is blind.

The Power of Melody is a fighting game for the Brackeys Game Jam where you have to try to make it past the skeletons to find the door. You are a traveling bard with a special talent - your one true love, singing, has the power to defeat evil - who got lost in the woods. Unfortunately, a witch has cursed you, and doing anything you love blinds you temporarily.

How to Play
  • Move around with WD
  • Click to attack
  • Jump with Space
Tools
  • Game Engine - Unity
  • Art - Krita
  • Music - MuseScore
